problem.markdown:
Refer A-03 from Exercises Set A. Compute the stirrer work done by the system, in MJ (megajoule). Enter your answer below with appropriate sign.
= -26.6 +- 2
[explanation] The absolute value of the stirrer work is calculated using Torque (τ)*Speed (Ω)*Time (t), when the torque and speed are constant. [explanation]
problem.p: Refer A-03 from Exercises Set A.
Compute the stirrer work done by the system, in MJ (megajoule). Enter your answer below with appropriate sign.

div.p: The absolute value of the stirrer work is calculated using Torque (τ)*Speed (Ω)*Time (t), when the torque and speed are constant.
